summary: REQ-12 appears implemented by removing the footer component from the authenticated AppLayout so no footer attribution can render. REQ-13 appears implemented by adding a small muted “Built by Abel Odoh” line directly under the “CloseCircle” (APP_NAME) title on the login screen. The diff also introduces at least one unrelated change (SoundEffectsManager added to AppLayout) that was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added SoundEffectsManager to the authenticated AppLayout (global sound cue manager rendered in layout).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says not to change unrelated features; sound management is not part of the attribution relocation/removal requirements.
